Attributes.description: Basic epidemiological designs as a framework for commonly used biostatistical techniques such as the Mantel-Haenszel, chi-squared, linear and logistic regression, and survival analysis. Computer packages will be available for computation of assignments.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) all of HCEP 400, HCEP 502 or (b) all of SPPH 400, SPPH 502 or (c) all of SPPH 567, SPPH 502.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Start Time: Thu^, End Time: 9:30, Building: 12:30
